The Positronic Man (Robot 0.6)

by Isaac Asimov, Robert Silverberg

In a twenty-first century Earth where the development of the positronic brain has revolutionized the way of life, beloved household robot ""Andrew"" struggles with his unusual capacity for emotion and dreams of becoming human. Reprint.
author: Isaac Asimov
